packet-beta

0-3: "Version (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)"

56-63: "Hop Limit (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)"
64-127: "Source Address (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)"
128-191: "Source Address (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)"
192-255: "Destination Address (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)"
256-319: "Destination Address (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)"
